heading: Hi, I'm Craig
summary: I'm a software developer living in New York City.
I'm interested in web applications and distributed systems, and I love solving problems.
I build scalable, performant software solutions, and I have experience with a wide variety of tecnologies.
I love music. I have played guitar in bands for years and I produce my own electronic music.
I'm an avid sports fan, world traveler, and movie buff.
